synopsis.text: Renaissance sparks are igniting 15th century Europe, yet those who dare to make groundbreaking discoveries often face the flames of heresy. In Poland, Rafał, a child prodigy, is destined to excel in theology, the era's most prestigious academic pursuit. However, a fateful encounter with an enigmatic stranger propels him down a path of forbidden knowledge and heretical truths. As Rafał delves deeper into uncharted intellectual territory, he challenges the established order and risks falling into the merciless hands of the Inquisition. Will his thirst for truth lead him to enlightenment or will he become yet another casualty in the name of heresy?
